title: Apigee - StreamingPull has a 100% error rate
abstract:
# Apigee - StreamingPull has a 100% error rate
You are currently viewing version 1.2 of the Apigee hybrid documentation. **This version is end of life.** You should upgrade to a newer version. For more information, see [Supported versions](/apigee/docs/hybrid/supported-platforms#supported-versions) .
If you see in your metrics dashboard that the method `google.pubsub.vl.Subscriber.StreamingPull` is failing with `100%` errors, you can safely ignore the issue. This is expected behavior. It is related to how hybrid internally configures a Google Cloud Pub/Sub API to operate with the synchronizer. See also [ StreamingPull has a 100% error rate (this is to be expected)](https://cloud.google.com/pubsub/docs/pull#streamingpull_has_a_100_error_rate_this_is_to_be_expected)
